formula.name: SimonBrot 6th
formula.reference: Xrn = 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xi) * Xi2 * Xi - abs(Xi2 * Xi) * Xi2 * Xi + 9 * abs(Xr * Xi2) * Xr * Xi2 - 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xr) * Xr * Xi2 + 3 * abs(Xi2 * Xi) * Xr2 * Xi - 9 * abs(Xr2 * Xi) * Xr2 * Xi - 3 * abs(Xr * Xi2) * Xr2 * Xr + abs(Xr2 * Xr) * Xr2 * Xr + Cr; Xin = 3 * Xi2 * Xi * abs(Xr * Xi2) - abs(Xr2 * Xr) * Xi2 * Xi - 9 * abs(Xr2 * Xi) * Xi2 * Xr - 9 * abs(Xr * Xi2) * Xi * Xr2 + 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xr) * Xi * Xr2 + 3 * abs(Xi2 * Xi) * Xr * Xi2 - abs(Xi2 * Xi) * Xr2 * Xr + 3 * abs(Xi * Xr2) * Xr2 * Xr + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn= 3 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xi,Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (Xi2 * Xi) - diffabs(Xi2 * Xi,3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (Xi2 * Xi) + 9 * diffabs(Xr * Xi2,2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (Xr * Xi2) - 3 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xr,3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (Xr * Xi2) + 3 * diffabs(Xi2 * Xi,3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (Xr2 * Xi) - 9 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xi,Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (Xr2 * Xi) - 3 * diffabs(Xr * Xi2,2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (Xr2 * Xr) + diffabs(Xr2 * Xr,3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (Xr2 * Xr) + 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xi + Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) - abs(Xi2 * Xi + 3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) + 9 * abs(Xr * Xi2 + 2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) - 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xr + 3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) + 3 * abs(Xi2 * Xi + 3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) - 9 * abs(Xr2 * Xi + Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) - 3 * abs(Xr * Xi2 + 2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) + abs(Xr2 * Xr + 3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) + cr; xin= 3 * diffabs(Xr * Xi2,2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (Xi2 * Xi) - diffabs(Xr2 * Xr,3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (Xi2 * Xi) - 9 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xi,Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (Xr * Xi2) - 9 * diffabs(Xr * Xi2,2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (Xr2 * Xi) + 3 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xr,3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (Xr2 * Xi) + 3 * diffabs(Xi2 * Xi,3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (Xr * Xi2) - diffabs(Xi2 * Xi,3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (Xr2 * Xr) + 3 * diffabs(Xr2 * Xi,Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (Xr2 * Xr) + 3 * abs(Xr * Xi2 + 2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) - abs(Xr2 * Xr + 3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) - 9 * abs(Xr2 * Xi + Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) - 9 * abs(Xr * Xi2 + 2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) * (Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) + 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xr + 3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) * (Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) + 3 * abs(Xi2 * Xi + 3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (2 * Xr * Xi * xi + Xr * xi2 + xr * Xi2 + 2 * xr * Xi * xi + xr * xi2) - abs(Xi2 * Xi + 3 * Xi2 * xi + 3 * Xi * xi2 + xi2 * xi) * (3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) + 3 * abs(Xr2 * Xi + Xr2 * xi + 2 * Xr * xr * Xi + 2 * Xr * xr * xi + xr2 * Xi + xr2 * xi) * (3 * Xr2 * xr + 3 * Xr * xr2 + xr2 * xr) + ci;
